org.ptodd

Class Links

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ptodd.Links

  •  class Links
extends java.lang.Object
    Manages a set of links to other states Provides methods to manage a set of links. Each link records the token of the state and the accumulated weight of the state. The 'recordLink' method will either add a new link if a link of the specified token does not already exist. If it does, the the weight of the link is increased by one. Created by ptdecker on 5/25/14.
